title: Component-Based Instructional Design: Social Competency Strengthening Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social science concepts and experience in fundamental workplace tasks
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, emphasizing continuous feedback through formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can identify key knowledge elements (agents, actions, procedures) for social interaction process analysis with 80% accuracy.
Learners can design and present three or more component-based instructional strategies (media, activities, assessments) tailored to given job contexts.
Learners can demonstrate 70% or higher application efficiency of knowledge-strategy combination principles in social problem-solving processes through PBL tasks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
